techmeme.title: Sources: Larry Ellison's Sensei Ag, a venture backed by his $500M investment to change farming with AI, robotics, and software, has mostly been a bust so far (Tom Dotan/Wall Street Journal)
A look at Vibecoding, a term popularized by AI researcher Andrej Karpathy for a trend where AI lets nontechnical hobbyists build bespoke apps for themselves (Kevin Roose/New York Times)
US bitcoin ETFs saw ~$3.3B in net outflow in Feb., the biggest monthly exodus since they debuted; BTC fell ~17% in Feb., its worst monthly drop since June 2022 (Bloomberg)
Pinterest says it is developing tools to label AI-generated or AI-altered content on its platform, amid an influx of AI slop from SEO spammers (Maggie Harrison/Futurism)
China mandates regulatory approvals for autonomous driving-related OTA software upgrades, aiming to prevent automakers from hiding defects or avoiding liability (Reuters)
